/hello_world.description: Simple greeting service demonstrating basic WASM interaction and parameter passing

/random.description: Generates random numbers using a seed-based approach for reproducible randomness

/fibonacci.description: Computes Fibonacci numbers with response caching for performance optimization

/calculator.description: Mathematical calculator supporting addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, power, and modulo operations

/time_utils.description: Advanced time and date manipulation with timezone support, formatting, and calculations

/text_utils.description: Comprehensive text processing including case conversion, analysis, pattern matching, and statistics

/url_utils.description: URL encoding, decoding, parsing, validation, and component extraction utilities

/hash_utils.description: Cryptographic hashing (MD5, SHA family) and encoding utilities (Base64, Hex)

/mandelbrot.description: Real-time Mandelbrot fractal generator with customizable parameters and PNG output

/process_file.description: File analysis and processing with controlled filesystem access patterns

/profile.description: Dynamic HTML profile generation using template rendering and parameter substitution

/wiki.description: Complete wiki system with CRUD operations, search, tagging, and responsive UI

/chat.description: Real-time chat application with persistent message storage and responsive interface
